title: My RP disappeared!
body: I had 1000 RP after having bought star Guardian skin! A few moments later my game ( and I can see that must of you had this problem too) start bugging. I can't enter champion select, and even the room mates started having problems. After this I just notice my RP is now 457!!!!! What is happening? What can I do? ðŸ˜¢

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and I do see Star Guardian Ahri was unlocked which placed you at your current RP balance.  It sounds like you had a connection hiccup though, which may have caused some syncing issues.  If this is happening, I recommend running through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune your network up!

Does your purchase history have anything you didn't do? Is it possible that you purchased something that cost more than you thought it did? Do you still have the skins that you purchased with that RP? How did you obtain your RP? Did you pay with it using your own card, a prepaid RP card, or receive it as a gift from someone else?
Probably hacked check your purchase history
